The wallpaper is "Siberia" by DogBox Studio (http://www.dogbox-studio.com) with their permission. DogBox studio resized
resized the original wall for this style and I thank them for their time and effort.. This is part of the permission slip:

You can include the link www.dogbox-studio.com. The website is under construction but it will be online soon. You’ll find the theme’s .zip file in attachment ;)

Thanks, DogBox Studio!
